mapper.insert: insert into sinput (s_code, s_title, s_write, s_start, s_end, s_detail )values (#{s_code}, #{s_title}, #{s_write}, #{s_start}, #{s_end}, #{s_detail})
mapper.update: UPDATE sinput SET s_title = #{s_title}, s_write = #{s_write}, s_start = #{s_start}, s_end= #{s_end}, s_detail= #{s_detail} WHERE s_code = #{s_code}
